slider.title: Watch What You Want, When You Want – Together!
slider.subtitle: Why pay full price when you can share the experience? With PatunganYuk!, you can enjoy all the benefits of Netflix by sharing the cost with friends or other users.

step1.title: Fill in Your Personal Details
step1.content: Start by signing up on PatunganYuk! by filling in your personal details. Enter your name, email, and other required information to create your account. The process is quick and easy, ensuring you're ready to share your favorite streaming services in no time.

step2.title: Choose a Product
step2.content: Once your account is set up, select the streaming service you want to share. Whether it’s Netflix, Spotify, Disney+, or another service, you can choose and find a sharing partner that matches your preferences. We offer a variety of options to ensure you get the best out of each service.

step3.title: Pay and Enjoy the Platform
step3.content: Complete the process by making your payment. Once the payment is done, you can immediately start enjoying the streaming service you've chosen, along with your sharing partners. It's that simple!

bestProduct.title: Our Best Product
bestProduct.description: Enjoy premium streaming services like Netflix and Spotify at a fraction of the cost. With PatunganYuk!, share subscriptions easily, manage accounts securely, and get the best value for your money. Join us and unlock endless entertainment together.

features.title: Account Management
features.description: Easily manage shared accounts, payments, and member access through our intuitive platform.

features.title: Subscription Sharing
features.description: Efficiently share the cost of streaming services and other subscriptions with like-minded users.

features.title: Seamless Collaboration
features.description: Effortlessly connect with partners, share subscriptions, and enjoy your favorite services together.

headline:
The cost of doing business
shouldn’t cost so damn much
description:
Enjoy budget-friendly options with our flexible pricing
Ensure affordability without compromising on quality or value.

faq.title: Frequently asked Questions
faq.description: Gain quick answers to your most common questions and find out how PatunganYuk! can enhance your streaming experience. If you need more detailed information, our support team is here to help.

questions.question: How does PatunganYuk! work?
questions.answer: PatunganYuk! connects users who want to share the cost of streaming subscriptions like Netflix, Spotify, and Disney+. Simply join or create a group, split the cost, and enjoy premium services together.

questions.question: How do I join a group on PatunganYuk!?
questions.answer: You can search for existing groups based on your preferred streaming service or create your own group. After selecting a group, follow the instructions to complete your payment and start sharing.

questions.question: What payment methods are supported?
questions.answer: PatunganYuk! supports a variety of payment methods including credit/debit cards, e-wallets, and bank transfers. Choose the method that best suits your needs.

questions.question: Is my account information secure?
questions.answer: Yes, we prioritize your security. Your personal and payment information is encrypted and securely stored. We also recommend using semi-private profiles to enhance privacy.

questions.question: How do I cancel or leave a group?
questions.answer: To leave a group, simply navigate to your account settings and select the option to exit the group. Please note that leaving a group will cancel your shared access to the service.
